title: Lewis wins Korn Ferry Tour Championship, earns PGA Tour card
text:
NEWBURGH, Ind. (AP) - Tom Lewis of England made good on a last-minute decision to play the Korn Ferry Tour Championship with a five-shot victory Monday to earn a PGA Tour card.

Lewis, who closed with a 7-under 65, moved up to No. 2 on the Korn Ferry Tour Finals points list to join 25 players who earned cards for the new PGA Tour season, which starts next week. In the three events that make up the Finals series, this was the only event Lewis played.

Fabian Gomez of Argentina shot 66 to finish second, moving him into the top 25 and securing his card.

The biggest moment belonged to Doug Ghim, who made an 8-foot par putt on the final hole to narrowly earn his card.
